passwordPolicy: length(8) and maxLength(32) and notUsername(undefined) and notEmail(undefined) and passwordHistory(3) and specialChars(1) and upperCase(1) and lowerCase(1) and digits(1)

urn:tpm-backend:policy:any-project-management-role
urn:tpm-backend:policy:any-admin
urn:tpm-backend:policy:any-admin-or-project-manager
Admins and project managers have full access to client types
Admins and project managers have full access to languages
Admins and project managers have full access to currencies

Admins and project managers have full access to industries

Admins have full access to users

Any user with project related role can read, export and query users

Anyone can access information about self

Any user with project related role can export and query projects
Any user with project management has full access to expense categories
Any user with project related role can read, downlaod, export and query files

Admins and project managers have full access to expense categories
